mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sync_record (user_id, record_id, amount, catalog_id, type, record_time, to_user_id) VALUES (#{userId}, #{recordId}, #{amount}, #{catalogId}, #{type}, #{recordTime}, #{toUserId})
mapper.delete: DELETE * FROM sync_record WHERE id IN (#{id})
mapper.select: SELECT id, record_id AS recordId, user_id AS userId, amount, catalog_id AS catalogId, `type`, record_time AS recordTime, status FROM sync_record WHERE to_user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY insert_time
